Bios.description: The Bios schema contains properties related to the BIOS Attribute Registry. The Attribute Registry describes the system-specific BIOS attributes and Actions for changing to BIOS settings. Changes to the BIOS typically require a system reset before they take effect.
Bios.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent BIOS attributes for a Redfish implementation.

title: #Bios.Bios
